q_ch: 2024年6月1日后的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks after June 1, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks scheduled after June 1, 2024:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group Name | Order Product ID |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|------------------|
| 33      | July 17, 2024       | August 3, 2024      | Advanced Sewers    | 33               |
| 32      | June 17, 2024       | July 14, 2024       | Premier Sewers     | 32               |
| 34      | July 10, 2024       | July 20, 2024       | Elite Sewers       | 34               |

Looks like there's a lot of stitching action happening! 🧵✨ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😄

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, op.number AS planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.start_time > '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024

response:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group Name | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|------------------|------------------|--------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 33      | July 17, 2024    | August 3, 2024   | Advanced Sewers    | 33               | 120            | 0                | 0      |
| 32      | June 17, 2024    | July 14, 2024    | Premier Sewers     | 32               | 150            | 0                | 0      |
| 34      | July 10, 2024    | July 20, 2024    | Elite Sewers       | 34               | 330            | 0                | 0      |

These tasks are all set to keep the sewing machines buzzing! 🧵✨ If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😄
